GSD36visnus_u:2801: Viṣṇu 73.11 apayantv\ asurā iti dvābhyāṃ tilaiḥ yātudhānānāṃ visarjanaṃ
GSD36visnus_u:2803: Viṣṇu 73.12 eta pitaraḥ sarvāṃs tān agra ā me yantv\ etad vaḥ pitara ity āvāhanaṃ kṛtvā\, kuśa-tila-miśreṇa gandha-udakena yās tiṣṭhanty\ a-mṛtā
GSD36visnus_u:2804: vāg iti yan me mātā^iti ca pādyaṃ nivedya\, arghyaṃ kṛtvā\ nivedya\

GSD36visnus_u:2807: Viṣṇu 73.13 ye māmakāḥ pitara etad vaḥ pitaro^ayaṃ yajña iti ca havir anumantraṇaṃ kṛtvā\ yathā^upapanneṣu pātreṣu viśeṣād rajata-mayeṣv annaṃ namo viśvebhyo devebhya ity annam ādau prāṅ-mukhayor nivedayet\ //

GSD36visnus_u:2821: Viṣṇu 73.25 bhuktavatsu brāhmaṇeṣu tṛptim āgateṣu, mā me kṣeṣthā^ity annaṃ
GSD36visnus_u:2822: sa-tṛṇam abhyukṣya\^anna-vikiram ucchiṣṭa-agrataḥ kṛtvā\, tṛptā bhavantaḥ saṃpannam iti ca pṛṣṭvā\ udaṅ-mukheṣv ācamanam ādau dattvā\, tataḥ
GSD36visnus_u:2823: prāṅ-mukheṣu dattvā\, tataś ca su-prokṣitam iti śrāddha-deśaṃ saṃprokṣya\,

GSD36visnus_u:3652: Viṣṇu 99.15c/ veda-dhvanau ca^apy atha śaṅkha-śabde svāhā-svadhāyām atha
GSD36visnus_u:3654: Viṣṇu 99.16a/ rājya-abhiṣeke ca tathā vivāhe yajñe vare snāta-śirasy
GSD36visnus_u:3656: Viṣṇu 99.16c/ puṣpeṣu śukleṣu ca parvateṣu phaleṣu ramyeṣu sarid-varāsu //
GSD36visnus_u:3657: Viṣṇu 99.17a/ saraḥsu pūrṇeṣu tathā jaleṣu sa-śādvalāyāṃ bhuvi
GSD36visnus_u:3659: Viṣṇu 99.17c/ vane ca vatse ca śiśau prahṛṣṭe sādhau nare dharma-parāyaṇe
GSD36visnus_u:3661: Viṣṇu 99.18a/ ācāra-seviny atha śāstra-nitye vinīta-veṣe ca tathā su-veṣe
GSD36visnus_u:3662: Viṣṇu 99.18c/ su-śuddha-dānte mala-varjite ca mṛṣṭa-aśane ca^atithi-pūjake
GSD36visnus_u:3664: Viṣṇu 99.19a/ svadāra-tuṣṭe nirate ca dharme dharma-utkaṭe ca^atyaśanād
GSD36visnus_u:3666: Viṣṇu 99.19c/ sadā sa-puṣpe sa-su-gandhi-gātre su-gandha-lipte ca vibhūṣite ca //
GSD36visnus_u:3667: Viṣṇu 99.20a/ satye sthite bhūta-hite niviṣṭe kṣama-anvite
GSD36visnus_u:3669: Viṣṇu 99.20c/ sva-kārya-dakṣe para-kārya-dakṣe kalyāṇa-citte ca sadā vinīte //
GSD36visnus_u:3670: Viṣṇu 99.21a/ nārīṣu nityaṃ su-vibhūṣitāsu pati-vratāsu priya-vādinīṣu /
GSD36visnus_u:3675: Viṣṇu 99.23a/ nimeṣa-mātraṃ ca vinā kṛtā^ahaṃ na jātu tiṣṭhe\
GSD36visnus_u:3677: Viṣṇu 100.01a/ dharma-śāstram idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ svayaṃ devena bhāṣitam /
GSD36visnus_u:3678: Viṣṇu 100.01c/ ye dvijā dhārayiṣyanti\ teṣāṃ svarge gatiḥ parā //
GSD36visnus_u:3679: Viṣṇu 100.02a/ idaṃ pavitraṃ maṅgalyaṃ svargyam āyuṣyam eva ca /
GSD36visnus_u:3680: Viṣṇu 100.02c/ jñānaṃ ca^eva yaśasyaṃ ca dhana-saubhāgya-vardhanam //
GSD36visnus_u:3681: Viṣṇu 100.03a/ adhyetavyaṃ dhāraṇīyaṃ śrāvyaṃ śrotavyam eva ca /
GSD36visnus_u:3682: Viṣṇu 100.03c/ śrāddheṣu śrāvaṇīyaṃ ca bhūti-kāmair naraiḥ sadā //
GSD36visnus_u:3683: Viṣṇu 100.04a/ ya idaṃ paṭhate\ nityaṃ bhūti-kāmo naraḥ sadā /
GSD36visnus_u:3684: Viṣṇu 100.04c/ idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ kathitaṃ ca dhare tava //
GSD36visnus_u:3685: Viṣṇu 100.05a/ mayā prasannena jagad-dhita-arthaṃ saubhāgyam etat paramaṃ
GSD36visnus_u:3688: śāśvata-dharma-śāstram // [End of Part 2 = end of Viṣṇu.]
